languages.text: {n}Маражай сжимает клинки в своих руках столь сильно, что вы слышите скрежет перчаток о рукояти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай сжимает клинки в своих руках столь сильно, что вы слышите скрежет перчаток о рукояти. Впервые за все это время кабалит избегает смотреть прямо на вас.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai grips his blades with such strength that you can hear the scraping of his gauntlets against the handles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай сжимает клинки в своих руках столь сильно, что вы слышите скрежет перчаток о рукояти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grips his blades with such strength that you can hear the scraping of his gauntlets against the handles.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grips his blades with such strength that you can hear the scraping of his gauntlets against the handles. For the first time, you see him avoiding your gaze.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grips his blades with such strength that you can hear the scraping of his gauntlets against the handles.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grips his blades with such strength that you can hear the scraping of his gauntlets against the handles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai agrippe si fermement les poignées de ses lames que vous entendez le frottement de ses gantelets contre leur garde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his blades with such strength that you can hear the scraping of his gauntlets against the handles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai agrippe si fermement les poignées de ses lames que vous entendez le frottement de ses gantelets contre leur garde. Pour la toute première fois, il fuit votre regard.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋紧紧地握紧了刀柄，你听到他的护手刮擦刀柄的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his blades with such strength that you can hear the scraping of his gauntlets against the handles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋紧紧地握紧了刀柄，你听到他的护手刮擦刀柄的声音。你看到他在躲闪你的目光，这种事情还是头一次。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが力強く刃を握ると、ガントレットが柄にこすれる音が聞こえた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his blades with such strength that you can hear the scraping of his gauntlets against the handles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが力強く刃を握ると、ガントレットが柄にこすれる音が聞こえた。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai umschließt seine Klingen so fest, dass du hörst, wie seine Handschuhe an den Griffen knirschen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his blades with such strength that you can hear the scraping of his gauntlets against the handles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai umschließt seine Klingen so fest, dass du hörst, wie seine Handschuhe an den Griffen knirschen. Zum ersten Mal bemerkst du, dass er deinem Blick ausweicht.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai aprieta sus espadas con tanta fuerza que oyes el rechinar de sus guanteletes contra las empuñaduras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his blades with such strength that you can hear the scraping of his gauntlets against the handles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai aprieta sus espadas con tanta fuerza que oyes el rechinar de sus guanteletes contra las empuñaduras. Es la primera vez que evita mirarte a los ojos.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, kılıçlarını öyle bir güçle kavrıyor ki eldivenleriyle kılıçların kabzasını sıkışını duyabiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grips his blades with such strength that you can hear the scraping of his gauntlets against the handles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, kılıçlarını öyle bir güçle kavrıyor ki eldivenleriyle kılıçların kabzasını sıkışını duyabiliyorsun.{/n}
